## Original

Source: <https://flora-on.pt/#/h2eJ7>.

![](Aster-aragonensis-MPorto.jpg){width="500" alt="Aster aragonensis MPorto"}

The hex logo for this package is a derivative work based on this photograph of an
_Aster aragonensis_ flower by botanist [Miguel
Porto](https://github.com/miguel-porto), sourced from
[Flora-On](https://flora-on.pt/), and is licensed under the Creative Commons
Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License ([CC BY-NC

## Logomark

Source: <https://www.pattern.institute/eunis.habitats/logo.svg>.

![](https://www.pattern.institute/eunis.habitats/logo.svg){width="500" alt="eunis.habitats logo"}

The logomark is a cropped version of the original photograph, adapted to fit a
hexagonal shape.

This means you are free to share and adapt the logomark for non-commercial
purposes as long as you give appropriate credit to the original creator, link to
the license, and indicate if changes were made. It also implies you cannot use
the material for commercial purposes, nor can you apply legal terms or
technological measures that legally restrict others from doing anything the
license permits.
